hero.title: Full-Stack Developer & Microsoft Power Platform Specialist
hero.description: I build production web apps, mobile apps, SaaS, Power Apps, and dashboards powered by Azure — fast, secure, and focused on measurable impact. I turn business problems into working solutions that stakeholders actually use.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Building Solutions That Matter
about.intro1: I'm {{name}} A full-stack developer and project manager experienced in building web applications, mobile applications, python desktop applications, and powers app manipulation
about.intro2: I combine hands-on development (front-end, back-end, databases, CI and CD ) with Microsoft stacks expertise (Power Platform, Office automation, and more ) to deliver production-ready MVPs and scalable features.
about.intro3: I enjoy leading small teams, mentoring contributors, and shipping open-source tools. I prioritize clear product goals, fast feedback cycles, and metrics that prove value.
about.intro4: I love learning new technologies and participate in open source projects

dashboard.subtitle: Power BI + Azure Data Pipeline

caseStudy.title: Staff Time & Approval System
caseStudy.subtitle: Power Apps + Power Automate + Azure SQL
caseStudy.problemDesc: The company relied on spreadsheets and email threads for time reporting and leave approvals. This manual process caused significant challenges:

problemItems.errors: Data entry errors leading to payroll discrepancies
problemItems.delays: Manual chasing of approvals causing delays (average 72 hours)
problemItems.audit: No audit trail or accountability for changes

caseStudy.goalDesc: Replace spreadsheets with a single, unified app for staff to submit time and leave requests, managers to approve efficiently, and payroll to export validated records. The primary objectives were to reduce approval latency and eliminate data errors.

powerApps.title: Power Apps Canvas
powerApps.description: Mobile + desktop form submission for time entries, leave requests, and attachment uploads

powerAutomate.title: Power Automate Flows
powerAutomate.description: Automated approval routing by manager, reminders, and complete audit trail

azureSql.title: Azure SQL Database
azureSql.description: Single source of truth for all time and approval records

blobStorage.title: Azure Blob Storage
blobStorage.description: Secure storage for attachments and supporting documents

azureAd.title: Azure AD Integration
azureAd.description: Role-based access control using Azure AD groups

payroll.title: Payroll Export
payroll.description: Nightly automated flow to CSV format for payroll system

responsibilityItems.ui: Power Apps UI/UX design and development

ux.title: UX Simplicity is Critical:
ux.description: A simple, role-aware user interface dramatically reduced support requests and increased adoption rates.

automation.title: Automation Drives Adoption:
automation.description: Automated reminders were essential for manager engagement and timely approvals.

communication.title: Stakeholder Communication:
